content: @Joshua Nelson I am trying to reproduce the issue https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/81311 . I made this test repo. I am unable to reproduce this issue. i am using cargo doc --no-deps to build documentation. image.png What am I missing here?
that is very strange, I'm using exactly your repo and seeing different results
what version of the compiler do you have? I'm using rustdoc 1.61.0-nightly (335ffbfa5 2022-03-11)
also, if you could post a screenshot of what the page looks like when you click on 'source', that would be helpful
oh weird, with your version it works for me as well
I wonder if cargo is treating path dependencies differently in the different versions
well, this is probably not worth worrying too much about then - hopefully all this will be fixed by -Zrustdoc-map being on by default anyway

if you really want to figure it out I suspect it would reproduce with a type alias from a crate on crates.io you use in a local crate, but only if the one on crates.io doesn't have html_root_url in the crate root
I don't know of such a crate, but I'm sure it exists
@Joshua Nelson can host 2 crates on github to reproduce this?
sure, I think that would work too
I was able to reproduce this with a git repository as inner crate
